Entries.Fri8: It's been a while since Abel visited!#$e#I mean, I understand him. He's busy doing him own things.#$e# It's also quite a trip to the village.#$e#I just miss my little nephew, that's all...$s

Entries.Thu2: Yesterday, Abel helped me move some boxes.#$b#His purple hair looks real good on him.$h#$b#Oh... h-hey!$l#$b#Don't tell him I said that!$a
Entries.Sun4: Abel called me 'swole.'$s#$b#I'm not sure what that means...$s#$b#Is that a compliment or an insult?$s

Entries.spring_12: Are you excited for the egg festival tomorrow?$1#$b#Watch out for Abel - he's clearly got his strategy down.$9

Entries.Tue8: Abel, Caroline's son, has one heck of a rebellious streak...$s#$e#I hope Trinnie doesn't get any ideas.$a#$b# I mean, Abel's a good guy, really.#$b#It's always good to expand your horizons.#$b#Just... maybe not that much.$u

Entries.summer_10: You should've seen last year's Luau. A fight broke out and Abel hit me with his flute.#$b#It was a real lute-ow.$h#$b#Hey, 'luau' puns are hard.

Entries.Pierre: I was planning on setting up a stall as well, but Abel convinced me that the gathering is supposed to be about fun, not profit.$s#$b#Oh well, more food for me!$

Entries.Kiarra: Cousin, the spider in the maze is AWESOME. Don't know what Abel's freaking out over, though.

Entries.Flor: I wonder if Abel will ever get tired of participating in the hunt.#$b#Not that I think he should!$u#$b#I'm really just wondering, I swear!$h

Entries.Sean: I set up some fake egg stink bombs where I know Abel likes to search. Gotta support my boy Keahi!$h#$b#Not my fault Louie happened to find one first...
Entries.Flor: Have you noticed how they don't seem to put an age limit on the Egg Hunt?#$b#It's most appealing for the children, but no one has an issue with young adults like Abel joining.
Entries.Flor_spouse: I wonder if Abel will ever get tired of participating in the hunt.#$b#Not that I think he should!$u#$b#I'm really just wondering, I swear!$h

Entries.Corine: Happy New Year, @!#$e#I bet I could climb down this mountain. Hmmm...#$b#Sorry. I was just thinking of something fun to do.$h#$e#Want to climb down this mountain with me?$h#$e#Hmmm... Maybe I should ask Ysa or Abel?
